properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 9 at 11:06AM CST by NWS Chicago IL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a Flood Warning
for the following rivers in Indiana...Illinois...

Iroquois River at Rensselaer affecting Jasper County
Iroquois River near Foresman affecting Newton County
Iroquois River at Iroquois affecting Iroquois County
Iroquois River near Chebanse affecting Iroquois and Kankakee
Counties

The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation as well
as forecast precipitation 72 hours into the future.

The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Iroquois River near Chebanse, or from Watseka downstream to
confluence with Kankakee River at Aroma Park.
* from late Saturday night until further notice.
* At 1045 AM Thursday the stage was 4.6 feet.
* Flood stage is 16.0 feet.
* Moderate flooding is forecast. Major flooding is possible.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Sunday morning and continue to
rise to near 20 feet by Tuesday evening.
* Impact...At 20.0 feet...Homes near the confluence of Iroquois and
Kankakee Rivers are threatened.
properties.instruction:
Safety message...If you encounter a flooded roadway...turn around and
find an alternate route.

Additional information can be found at weather.gov/chicago.
